title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies in Technical Education: Strengthening Design and Problem-Solving Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can select three materials suitable for a design problem by analyzing given material properties
Learners can improve functional defects in prototypes by over 50% after incorporating at least two rounds of design feedback
Learners can explain five factors to consider when selecting materials by referencing cases shared in online communities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
